root.name: Space Raiders
root.description: OVERVIEW Space Raiders is an update to the 1978 Space Invaders arcade game, developed by Taito Corporation and published by Taito Corporation as well as Mastiff and Tommo. Released Dec 19, 2002 in Japan and Sep 5, 2003 on the Play Station 2, Jan 9, 2003 and in North America April 19, 2005 on the Nintendo GameCube. GAMEPLAY Space Raiders uses similar gameplay to the 1978 original in a weird but similar way. First of the camera is positions behind other character as if itâ€™s a third person view, you also have a limited amount of space to move around in just like the original game. Through certain points in the gameplay you will acquire a weapons boost, this will allow you to deal more damage and take out more aliens. Space Raiders consists of only six levels and will take the average gamer around or under the two hour mark to complete. CHARACTERS Theirs are only a few characters to choose from on the game, these are Justin (street ten), Ashley (fashion photographer) and Naji (police officer).
